review.title: “dreary”
review.pros: Pros – Good place to work if you are looking for a well paying factory job, but not conducive to going to school as well nor for the intellectually inclined.
review.cons: Cons – This factory is hot, dirty, and full of opinionated people, not the least of which is the owner who regularly hands out political propaganda.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend
